title: Documentation for NCCL backend in torch.distributed is incorrect
body_html:
Documentation claims that NCCL backend supports scatter and gather operations which aren't supported:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/v0.4.0/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelNccl.cpp#L669
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/v0.4.0/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelNccl.cpp#L678

body:
[Documentation](https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/distributed.html) claims that NCCL backend supports scatter and gather operations which aren't supported: 
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/v0.4.0/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelNccl.cpp#L669
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/v0.4.0/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/DataChannelNccl.cpp#L678
